Ancestry-Gnome -- Male Wellspring Gnome Fighter
Strength: +0 Dexterity: +3 Constitution: +2 Intelligence: +1 Wisdom: +1 Charisma: +2
Background: Acolyte Deity: Gozreh
Experience: 482/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 20 Size: Small Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 5/10
Attribute Notes:
Armor Speed Penalty: -5 Speed
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 1; Class: 1; General: 0; Skill: 2 Selectable Feature Count: Fighter (Key Attribute); Gnome (Heritage); Gnome (Wellspring)
Feats: Additional Lore (Abadar Lore); Animal Accomplice; Animal Elocutionist; Assurance (Abadar Lore); Cautious Curiosity (Occult); Energized Font; Exacting Strike; Fey Fellowship; First World Adept; First World Magic; Gnome Obsession; Gnome Weapon Familiarity; Homeward Bound; Illusion Sense; Instinctive Obfuscation; Life Leap; Project Persona; Razzle-Dazzle; Vivacious Conduit Fighter Features: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attack Trained (Advanced Weapons); Attribute Boost (Dexterity); Attribute Boosts; Class Trained (Fighter); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense); Dexterity; Fighter Feats; Fighter Key Attribute; Fighter Skills; Perception Expert; Reactive Strike; Save Expert (Fortitude; Reflex); Save Trained (Will); Shield Block Acolyte Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Gnome Features: Ancestry Feats; Arcane Wellspring; Attribute Boost (Charisma; Constitution; Choose 1 from any); Attribute Flaw (Strength); Chameleon Gnome; Fey-Touched Gnome; Gnome Heritage; Low-Light Vision; Sensate Gnome; Small; Umbral Gnome; Wellspring Gnome
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 1 selections
Animal Accomplice: Has the Familiar feature
Fighter Feats: 1 selections
Fighter Key Attribute: 1 selection
Gnome Heritage: 1 selection
Gnome Obsession: +2 Skill Feat (Additional Lore and Assurance for chosen Lore)
Umbral Gnome: Has the Darkvision feature
Wellspring Gnome: 1 selection
Chameleon Gnome: Can use a 1-hr process to change skin and hair colors
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Familiar: Has a Tiny animal minion
Fey-Touched Gnome: Has the fey trait
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +6 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Abadar Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained) Deception: +2 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Acrobatics: +1 (dexterity; untrained) Diplomacy: +2 (charisma; untrained) Scribing Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +1 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +2 (charisma; untrained) Society: +4 (intelligence; trained)
Architecture Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained) Medicine: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Athletics: +1 (strength; trained) Nature: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +1 (wisdom; untrained)
Cavern Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained) Occultism: +1 (intelligence; untrained) Thievery: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +1 (intelligence; untrained) Performance: +2 (charisma; untrained) Underground Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained)
Languages: Common; Fey; Gnomish; Kholo
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Abadar Lore): Skill Trained (Abadar Lore)
Armor Skill Penalty: -2 strength and dexterity skills
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 4 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Animal Elocutionist: Can speak with animals and gains +1 to Make An Impression on them
Assurance (Abadar Lore): Can take an automatic 13 on Abadar Lore checks
Chameleon Gnome: (1) Gains +2 Stealth until surroundings change
Fey Fellowship: +2 Perception (fey)/Can make a -5 Diplomacy check to Make An Impression upon meeting fey and retry a failure after 1 min of conversation
Gnome Obsession: Can use 1 day of downtime to change the chosen Gnome Obsession skill
Illusion Sense: +1 Perception (illusions)
Sensate Gnome: Has R30' imprecise scent; can use it to gain +2 Perception to locate a creature
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 20 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Gnome Flickmace (+5 1d6 B; strength; expert); Longspear (+5 1d8 P; strength; expert); Sawtooth Saber (+6 1d6 S; dexterity; trained); Shield Boss (+5 1d6 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Gnome Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Gnome Weapons; Glaive; Kukri)
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward the multiple attack penalty on failure
Gnome Weapon Familiarity: Has access to kukris and uncommon gnome weapons
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Vivacious Conduit: 10 min rest restores 1 HP
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Fey Fellowship: +2 vs. fey
Illusion Sense: +1 Will vs. illusions/R10' Automatically attempts to disbelieve illusions
Magic
Attack: Arcane Innate: +5 (charisma; trained); Occult Innate: +5 (charisma; trained); Primal Innate: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 15 (charisma; trained); Occult Innate: 15 (charisma; trained); Primal Innate: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Disguise Magic (O1): (1 min) Alters the magical aura of the target object, making it appear as non-magical, as a common magical item of up to twice the spell level, or as under the effects of a spell of up to the spell level, until next daily prep (heightened 2nd can affect a creature or all of its possessions)
Interplanar Teleport (P7): (10 min) Transports self and 8 willing targets to an imprecise location on a different plane
Invisibility (P2): (2) Touched becomes invisible for 10 min; using a hostile action ends (heightened 4th effects last for 1 min, and a hostile action does not end the spell)
Revealing Light (P2): (2) R120' 10' burst dazzles makes concealed creatures visible and invisible creatures concealed for 1 min (save Reflex effects last 2 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects last 10 min)
Silence (O2): (2) Willing touched makes no sound for 1 min (heightened 4th affects a 10' radius around touched)
Magic Notes:
Cautious Curiosity (Occult): Knows the Disguise Magic and Silence occult innate spells; can cast each on self at 2nd rank once per day
First World Adept: Knows the Invisibility and Revealing Light primal innate spells; can cast each at 2nd rank once per day
Homeward Bound: Knows the Interplanar Teleport primal innate spell; can use it twice per week to travel to and from the First World
Energized Font: (1) Regains 1 Focus Point once per day
Fey-Touched Gnome: Can cast a chosen primal cantrip as an innate spell at will; may spend 10 min to choose a different cantrip once per day
First World Magic: Can cast a chosen primal cantrip as an innate spell at will
Instinctive Obfuscation: (R) Forces a DC 10 flat check on an attacking foe once per hr; failure negates the attack
Life Leap: (1) Passes through an adjacent creature to the opposite side
Project Persona: (1) Places an illusion of normal clothing over self armor
Razzle-Dazzle: (F) Extends an inflicted blinded or dazzled condition by 1 rd once per hr
Wellspring Gnome (Arcane): Can cast a chosen arcane cantrip as an innate spell at will
Notes
Validation Errors:
Ancestry Feats Allocation: 1 available vs. 16 allocated
Cautious Curiosity (Occult) Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9
Energized Font Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5 and focus pool feature
First World Adept Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and primal innate rank (currently 1)
Gnome Heritage Allocation: 1 available vs. 5 allocated
Homeward Bound Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 17
Instinctive Obfuscation Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13
Life Leap Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9
Project Persona Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Vivacious Conduit Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9
